description.text: Service Pack 3 for Microsoft SQL Server 2012 upgraded all Microsoft SQL Server 2012 instances and components installed through the SQL Server setup.  Service Pack 3 can upgrade all editions of Microsoft SQL Server 2012 to Service Pack 3 level. For customers in need of additional installation options, please visit the Microsoft Download Center and download the Service Pack 3 Microsoft SQL Server 2012. To learn more about Microsoft SQL Server 2012 SP3 please visit the Microsoft Support (http://support.microsoft.com) Knowledge Base article KB 3072779.
